Text:
Thanks a lot, BBS. I had been looking for the Don Camilo books for quite a while, and I got it now through you. Thanks again.
Do you have any James Herriot books? Will it be possible to include them in your next upload?

Hello BBS! Thank you for all the great books. I was wondering if you could find any by the following authors:  Sophie Hannah
              Christos Tsiolkas ( The Slap)
 Many Many Thanks!!!!
Thank you BBS for the great books!!!! You are the best :)

@kittu1953

Your welcome and yes I have a few of "James Herriot" will post in next flood :)
thanks for all of your books BBS, do you have any Kay Hooper?  would really appreciate it, thanks again
what a treasure you are! thank you, thank you. I can't believe you have responded so quickly and thoroughly. Well done!
Thanks BBS...Looking forward to your next flood
A BIG THANK YOU ,dearest BBS
DO you have anything by GK  Chesterton??

DO you have anything by GK  Chesterton??
Also Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn  ???

@squinn1222

Yes, I have "Kay Hooper" will upload on the next flood :)

There are some really good books in this flood!!! A special thank you for Secret Daughter. I can't wait to start reading some of these books, many I have been waiting for and some are a great surprise. Thanks for keeping me entertained :)

Hello BBS. I just wanted to extend a heartfelt "thank you". I, like many, many other book lovers, eagerly await your uploads, especially these ePUB Book Floods. Your time, effort and hard work is very much appreciated.
Craig Johnson????

@chinook92

Your welcome :)

Thank you and welcome :)

Hi :)

Any Unabridged Audio? Looking for Iris Johannsen - What Doesn't Kill You
thank you SO much! You're doing an amazing job!

Great selection of books. I particularly have been looking forward to finding the Sherbrooke books of Catherine Coulter. Do you, by any chance, happen to have access to any or all of the erotic works of Megan Hart, Emma Holly and Kate Douglas? Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Your welcome
Thanks heaps, if you have the Henderson Boys series by Robert Muchamore (3, 4 and 5) as well as the new CHERUB series.
Kerry Greenwood!  Thanks so much!

Hello bigbluesea,
Many thanks for the wonderful uploads! I was wondering if you had the following books or if you could find them for me? 
"Are you there alone?" by Sheila O'Malley
"Loving Natalee" by Beth Holloway
Both are in the true crime genre.
I would so appreciate your help in finding these books. :)
